Portrait Mode

My dell monitor’s screws loosen.

Instead of fixing them back, I thought I should give portrait mode a try. (: I’m using the 3bucks ikea holder to support it)

Turns out it’s pretty good for reading code, writing articles and timeline-based activities (:
